TEXT.S: Tayak plahan ka tatak aring sraral qani hya ga, ini kta iyal misu qani la, nanu' yasa qu cyux naha' kblayun kya qalang na ulay kya Momoyama song misu qani. s'agal naha kkbalay balay Tayal sraral, nanu' pshiluq quw hiluq . ya qasa lga, mpcisal kya qu Tayal lga, niwan nuyx nya pksawbihun uziy qu inlungan na Tayal uziy. ru ktan kya uziy qu ppsbaq 'laqi' gaga na Tayal uziy. niwan nyux nya' pslhingun p'ubuy uziy qu gaga qnxan Tayal sraral uziy.
